scripts.pack: npm run build && powershell -Command "try { if (Test-Path '..\pcurich-client-storage') { Push-Location '..\pcurich-client-storage'; if (Test-Path 'package.json') { try { npm run build -s } catch {}; npm pack -s; } Pop-Location; Copy-Item -Path '..\pcurich-client-storage\*.tgz' -Destination '.' -Force } } catch {} ; try { if (Test-Path '..\pcurich-http-mock-workbench') { Push-Location '..\pcurich-http-mock-workbench'; if (Test-Path 'package.json') { try { npm run build -s } catch {}; npm pack -s; } Pop-Location; Copy-Item -Path '..\pcurich-http-mock-workbench\*.tgz' -Destination '.' -Force } } catch {} ; Copy-Item -Path '*.tgz' -Destination './dist' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Path 'pcurich-client-storage-2.0.0.tgz' -Destination './dist' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Path 'pcurich-http-mock-workbench-2.0.0.tgz' -Destination './dist' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue" && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p=require('./dist/package.json'); p.dependencies={'@pcurich/client-storage':'file:pcurich-client-storage-2.0.0.tgz','@pcurich/http-mock-workbench':'file:pcurich-http-mock-workbench-2.0.0.tgz','tslib':(p.dependencies&&p.dependencies.tslib)?p.dependencies.tslib:'^2.3.0'}; p.main='fesm2022/lib-mock-workbench.mjs'; p.module='fesm2022/lib-mock-workbench.mjs'; p.typings='index.d.ts'; p.exports={'./package.json':{default:'./package.json'},'.':{types:'./index.d.ts',import:'./fesm2022/lib-mock-workbench.mjs',require:'./fesm2022/lib-mock-workbench.mjs',default:'./fesm2022/lib-mock-workbench.mjs'}}; p.sideEffects=false; /* ensure files include packaged assets and tgz */ p.files=['*','fesm2022/**','index.d.ts','*.tgz','README.md']; fs.writeFileSync('./dist/package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2));" && cd dist && npm pack
